last_episode_to_air.name: A Very GLOW Christmas
last_episode_to_air.overview: With morale running low, Carmen convinces the team to perform "A Christmas Carol" in the ring. Debbie and Bash strike up an unlikely new partnership.

name: GLOW
overview: In 1980s LA, a crew of misfits reinvent themselves as the Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: New faces, big life changes and the pressures of showbiz stoke tensions on set as Ruth and the gang try to take their show to the next level.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Desperate to jump-start her career, struggling actress Ruth heads to a casting call at an LA gym -- and quickly realizes it's not a typical audition.

episodes.name: Slouch. Submit.
episodes.overview: Cherry tries to whip the final group into shape, while Sam sets out in pursuit of a star for his show. Ruth acts out an uncomfortable scene.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Kuntar
episodes.overview: Sam's flashy young producer drops in and whisks the girls off to Malibu to party. But artistic differences soon threaten to spoil the fun.

episodes.name: The Dusty Spur
episodes.overview: With just five weeks left to crank out a show, Sam and Bash move all the ladies into a motel. Ruth struggles to nail down a memorable character.

episodes.name: Debbie Does Something
episodes.overview: Debbie attends her first wrestling match and has a major epiphany. Meanwhile, Ruth finally finds the inspiration for her alter ego.

episodes.name: This Is One of Those Moments
episodes.overview: Sam searches for the perfect "heel" to fight Debbie, but she's tough to please. To hone her act, Ruth tags along with Gregory to a family function.

episodes.name: Live Studio Audience
episodes.overview: As the women prepare for their first live match, Debbie and Ruth seek outside help with their moves, and Rhonda gives Sam a good-luck gift.

episodes.name: Maybe It's All the Disco
episodes.overview: Jenny whips up a party for Sheila's birthday while Sam helps Ruth deal with a new complication in her personal life. Mark changes his tune with Debbie.

episodes.name: The Liberal Chokehold
episodes.overview: With the show's future in jeopardy, Bash and the ladies search for creative way to drum up cash. A pair of revelations leaves Sam reeling.

episodes.name: Money's in the Chase
episodes.overview: On the day of the big taping, Sam attends to unfinished personal business, while Ruth scrambles to make last-minute changes to the lineup.

episodes.name: Viking Funeral
episodes.overview: Nerves run high as the ladies return to work and meet a new cast member. To boost morale, Ruth takes the gang on a raucous outing to the mall.

episodes.name: Candy of the Year
episodes.overview: The ladies get creative when Sam forces them to compete for airtime. Debbie discovers the producer life isn't quite what she'd hoped.

episodes.name: Concerned Women of America
episodes.overview: Ruth connects with a fellow film lover and helps Debbie cook up a PSA to appease an angry women's group. Cherry struggles on the set of her new show.

episodes.name: Mother of All Matches
episodes.overview: On the day of the big match between Welfare Queen and Liberty Belle, Tammé visits her son at Stanford, and Debbie hits an emotional wall.

episodes.name: Perverts Are People, Too
episodes.overview: A request from the network puts the producers on edge, the wrestlers capitalize on their growing fan base, and Ruth receives a surprising invitation.

episodes.name: Work the Leg
episodes.overview: Facing new competition, the women vow to amp up their wrestling. A startling discovery changes Sam's outlook on the show.

episodes.name: Nothing Shattered
episodes.overview: After an injury on set, Sam and the wrestlers rush to the hospital and wait anxiously for news. A long-simmering feud finally boils over.

episodes.name: The Good Twin
episodes.overview: It's the moment you’ve been waiting for: A straight-to-the-airwaves episode of “GLOW,” complete with dream sequences, music videos and epic wrestling.

episodes.name: Rosalie
episodes.overview: As the ladies begin to plan for life after the show, Justine's mom shows up on Sam's doorstep, and Bash and Debbie scheme to woo buyers at a TV expo.

episodes.name: Every Potato Has a Receipt
episodes.overview: Wedding bells are ringing as the wrestlers step through the ropes for the big finale. But last-minute twists catch everyone off guard.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: New faces, big life changes and the pressures of showbiz stoke tensions on set as Ruth and the gang try to take their show to the next level.

episodes.name: Up, Up, Up
episodes.overview: Hours before GLOW's opening show at the Fan-Tan casino in Las Vegas, a national tragedy unfolds on live TV, leaving everyone spooked.

episodes.name: Hot Tub Club
episodes.overview: On a day off, Sam teaches Ruth how to gamble, Bash struggles to take care of an ailing Rhonda, and Arthie and Yolanda face an intimate dilemma.

episodes.name: Desert Pollen
episodes.overview: Fed up with the ladies' sloppy performances and lack of training, Cherry takes them to a showgirl dance class, which stokes Debbie's insecurities.

episodes.name: Say Yes
episodes.overview: Fed up with the ladies' sloppy performances and lack of training, Cherry takes them to a showgirl dance class, which stokes Debbie's insecurities.

episodes.name: Freaky Tuesday
episodes.overview: Tammé's back problems lead to a major shake-up in the ring. An offer to extend the show divides the producers. Justine asks Sam to read her screenplay.

episodes.name: Outward Bound
episodes.overview: A camping trip in the desert canyons outside Vegas spirals into a night of soul-searching, bitter showdowns and bombshell revelations.

episodes.name: Hollywood Homecoming
episodes.overview: Sam takes Justine to meet with studio execs, Birdie arrives in Las Vegas to spend time with her daughter-in-law, and Debbie makes a new friend.

episodes.name: Keep Ridin'
episodes.overview: As Ruth grapples with major doubts about her path in life, Bash and Rhonda go on a spending spree, and Cherry and Carmen pick up a new side gig.

episodes.name: The Libertines
episodes.overview: Ruth heads to LA for her big audition, Debbie helps Bobby take the Libertine Ball to the next level, and Rhonda plots to rekindle Bash's interest.

episodes.name: A Very GLOW Christmas
episodes.overview: With morale running low, Carmen convinces the team to perform "A Christmas Carol" in the ring. Debbie and Bash strike up an unlikely new partnership.
